name: foodyou
description: Hello World! Welcome to one of my first big projects that im actually developing at school! This is a ``react-native`` app integrated with an image detector made with `teachable machine` to help people recognize if an edible prodcuct is compatible with your diet --- ## Features - Product recongition  - Recommendation on similar products that match with your diet - Pre-loaded diets ex. vegan, celiac, etc..
